history.proof: intros l. induction l. - apply permutation_nil. - apply permutation_skip. auto.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
A: Type

Goal:
forall l : list A, permutation l l

Premises:
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
Inductive permutation : list A -> list A -> Prop := permutation_nil : permutation [] [] | permutation_skip : forall (a : A) (l1 l2 : list A), permutation l2 l1 -> permutation (a :: l2) (a :: l1) | permutation_swap : forall (a b : A) (l : list A), permutation (a :: b :: l) (b :: a :: l) | permutation_trans : forall l1 l2 l3 : list A, permutation l1 l2 -> permutation l2 l3 -> permutation l1 l3 Arguments permutation (_ _)%list_scope Arguments permutation_skip _ (_ _)%list_scope Arguments permutation_swap _ _ _%list_scope Arguments permutation_trans (_ _ _)%list_scope
permutation_ind : forall P : list A -> list A -> Prop, P [] [] -> (forall (a : A) (l1 l2 : list A), permutation l2 l1 -> P l2 l1 -> P (a :: l2) (a :: l1)) -> (forall (a b : A) (l : list A), P (a :: b :: l) (b :: a :: l)) -> (forall l1 l2 l3 : list A, permutation l1 l2 -> P l1 l2 -> permutation l2 l3 -> P l2 l3 -> P l1 l3) -> forall l l0 : list A, permutation l l0 -> P l l0
permutation_sind : forall P : list A -> list A -> SProp, P [] [] -> (forall (a : A) (l1 l2 : list A), permutation l2 l1 -> P l2 l1 -> P (a :: l2) (a :: l1)) -> (forall (a b : A) (l : list A), P (a :: b :: l) (b :: a :: l)) -> (forall l1 l2 l3 : list A, permutation l1 l2 -> P l1 l2 -> permutation l2 l3 -> P l2 l3 -> P l1 l3) -> forall l l0 : list A, permutation l l0 -> P l l0
permutation_trans : forall l1 l2 l3 : list A, permutation l1 l2 -> permutation l2 l3 -> permutation l1 l3
ForallOrdPairs_ForallPairs : forall (A : Type) (R : A -> A -> Prop), (forall x : A, R x x) -> (forall x y : A, R x y -> R y x) -> forall l : list A, ForallOrdPairs R l -> ForallPairs R l
Add_sind : forall (A : Type) (a : A) (P : list A -> list A -> SProp), (forall l : list A, P l (a :: l)) -> (forall (x : A) (l l' : list A), Add a l l' -> P l l' -> P (x :: l) (x :: l')) -> forall l l0 : list A, Add a l l0 -> P l l0
Add_ind : forall (A : Type) (a : A) (P : list A -> list A -> Prop), (forall l : list A, P l (a :: l)) -> (forall (x : A) (l l' : list A), Add a l l' -> P l l' -> P (x :: l) (x :: l')) -> forall l l0 : list A, Add a l l0 -> P l l0
list_rec : forall (A : Type) (P : list A -> Set), P [] -> (forall (a : A) (l : list A), P l -> P (a :: l)) -> forall l : list A, P l
list_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : list A -> Prop), P [] -> (forall (a : A) (l : list A), P l -> P (a :: l)) -> forall l : list A, P l
ForallOrdPairs_ind : forall (A : Type) (R : A -> A -> Prop) (P : list A -> Prop), P [] -> (forall (a : A) (l : list A), Forall (R a) l -> ForallOrdPairs R l -> P l -> P (a :: l)) -> forall l : list A, ForallOrdPairs R l -> P l
Forall_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) (P0 : list A -> Prop), P0 [] -> (forall (x : A) (l : list A), P x -> Forall P l -> P0 l -> P0 (x :: l)) -> forall l : list A, Forall P l -> P0 l
ext_in_map : forall (A B : Type) (f g : A -> B) (l : list A), map f l = map g l -> forall a : A, In a l -> f a = g a
Inductive permutation : list A -> list A -> Prop := permutation_nil : permutation [] [] | permutation_skip : forall (a : A) (l1 l2 : list A), permutation l2 l1 -> permutation (a :: l2) (a :: l1) | permutation_swap : forall (a b : A) (l : list A), permutation (a :: b :: l) (b :: a :: l) | permutation_trans : forall l1 l2 l3 : list A, permutation l1 l2 -> permutation l2 l3 -> permutation l1 l3 Arguments permutation (_ _)%list_scope Arguments permutation_skip _ (_ _)%list_scope Arguments permutation_swap _ _ _%list_scope Arguments permutation_trans (_ _ _)%list_scope
map_ext_in : forall (A B : Type) (f g : A -> B) (l : list A), (forall a : A, In a l -> f a = g a) -> map f l = map g l
ForallOrdPairs_In : forall (A : Type) (R : A -> A -> Prop) (l : list A), ForallOrdPairs R l -> forall x y : A, In x l -> In y l -> x = y \/ R x y \/ R y x
Forall_dec : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop), (forall x : A, {P x} + {~ P x}) -> forall l : list A, {Forall P l} + {~ Forall P l}
Relation_Operators.Ltl_sind : forall (A : Set) (leA : A -> A -> Prop) (P : list A -> list A -> SProp), (forall (a : A) (x : list A), P [] (a :: x)) -> (forall a b : A, leA a b -> forall x y : list A, P (a :: x) (b :: y)) -> (forall (a : A) (x y : list A), Relation_Operators.Ltl A leA x y -> P x y -> P (a :: x) (a :: y)) -> forall l l0 : list A, Relation_Operators.Ltl A leA l l0 -> P l l0
find_max_correct : forall (A : Type) (f : A -> nat) (l : list A), match find_max f l with | Some (a, b) => (In b l /\ a = f b) /\ (forall c : A, In c l -> f c <= f b) | None => l = [] end
Inductive Add (A : Type) (a : A) : list A -> list A -> Prop := Add_head : forall l : list A, Add a l (a :: l) | Add_cons : forall (x : A) (l l' : list A), Add a l l' -> Add a (x :: l) (x :: l') Arguments Add [A]%type_scope _ (_ _)%list_scope Arguments Add_head [A]%type_scope _ _%list_scope Arguments Add_cons [A]%type_scope [a] _ [l l']%list_scope
permutation_skip : forall (a : A) (l1 l2 : list A), permutation l2 l1 -> permutation (a :: l2) (a :: l1)
app_nil_r : forall (A : Type) (l : list A), l ++ [] = l
rev_nth : forall (A : Type) (l : list A) (d : A) (n : nat), n < length l -> nth n (rev l) d = nth (length l - S n) l d
NoDup_cons : forall (A : Type) (x : A) (l : list A), ~ In x l -> NoDup l -> NoDup (x :: l)
app_nth1 : forall (A : Type) (l l' : list A) (d : A) (n : nat), n < length l -> nth n (l ++ l') d = nth n l d
FOP_cons : forall (A : Type) (R : A -> A -> Prop) (a : A) (l : list A), Forall (R a) l -> ForallOrdPairs R l -> ForallOrdPairs R (a :: l)
rev_length : forall (A : Type) (l : list A), length (rev l) = length l

```coq
intros l.
induction l.
- apply permutation_nil.
- simpl. apply permutation_skip. auto.
Qed.```
